    • getBoolean

      public boolean getBoolean(String name, boolean fallback, Enum<?> cookie)
      Get a request parameter as a boolean with a default value, and an optional cookie persistence.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of a request parameter.
      fallback - Default value.
      cookie - Name of a cookie is given as an Enum to control cookies proliferation.
      Returns:
      Priority order: request, cookie, fallback.

    • getEnum

      public Enum<?> getEnum(String name, Enum<?> fallback)
      Get a request parameter as an Enum value that will ensure a closed list of values, with a default value if wrong.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of a request parameter.
      fallback - Default value.
      Returns:
      The value from Enum.

    • getEnum

      public Enum<?> getEnum(String name, Enum<?> fallback, String cookie)
      Get a request parameter as an Enum value that will ensure a closed list of values, with a default value if wrong.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of a request parameter.
      fallback - Default value.
      cookie - Cookie persistency.
      Returns:
      The value from Enum.

    • getEnum

      public Enum<?> getEnum(String name, Enum<?> fallback, Enum<?> cookie)
      Get a request parameter as an Enum value that will ensure a closed list of values, with a default value, and an optional cookie persistence.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of a request parameter.
      fallback - Default value.
      cookie - Name of a cookie for persistence.
      Returns:
      Priority order: request, cookie, fallback.

      Parameters:
      name - Name of http param.
      fallback - Default value.
      cookie - Name of a cookie is given as an Enum to control cookies proliferation.

      Priority order: request, cookie, fallback.

    • getIntRange

      public int[] getIntRange(String name, int[] range)
      Get an int Range between a min and a max (included).
      Parameters:
      name - Name of an http param
      range - range[0] = min value, range[1] = max
      Returns:
      [] if no value or values = [min, max], [point] if one value, [lower, upper] if 2 value

    • getString

      public String getString(String name, String fallback, Enum<?> cookie)
      Get a request parameter as a String with a default value, or optional cookie persistence.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of http param.
      fallback - Default value.
      cookie - Name of a cookie is given as an Enum to control cookies proliferation.
      Returns:
      Priority order: request, cookie, fallback.

    • getStringOf

      public String getStringOf(String name, Set<String> set, String fallback)
      Get a request parameter as a String from a list of value (first is default)

    • getStringSet

      public String[] getStringSet(String name)
      Get a repeated parameter as an array of String, filtered of empty strings and repeated values. Original order is kept, first seen,
      Parameters:
      name - Name of request parameter
      Returns:
      Null if no plain values
